prompt: Create a sleek dashboard with dark blue background and gold accents. Include side drawer accessible via hamburger icon in top app bar with centered 'Analytics' title. Display 'Good Evening, Sophie!' greeting in bold white font. Arrange four metric cards in 2x2 grid with gold-tinted backgrounds, values, labels, and icons with subtle shadows and sharp corners. Add 'Recent Activity' section with gold header and three list items in dark cards with gold borders using elegant spacing and luxurious gold accents.
